meanings.definition: A radiographic examination of the bile ducts using a contrast medium.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended a cholangiogram to check the bile ducts.
meanings.sent2: The cholangiogram showed a blockage in the bile duct.
meanings.sent3: During the cholangiogram, the contrast medium made the bile ducts look like colorful rivers.
meanings.sent4: The cholangiogram revealed the hidden paths of the bile duct system.
meanings.sent5: The cholangiogram image was as clear as a map of the bile duct highways.

meanings.definition: The resulting image produced by a cholangiogram.
meanings.sent1: The cholangiogram displayed a detailed view of the bile ducts.
meanings.sent2: I studied the cholangiogram carefully to understand the bile duct structure.
meanings.sent3: The cholangiogram image looked like a colorful puzzle of the bile ducts.
meanings.sent4: She marveled at the intricate patterns captured in the cholangiogram.
meanings.sent5: The cholangiogram image was a snapshot of the bile duct network.
